name: Flights External Table on Dedicated Pool

content.query:
CREATE MASTER KEY

-- Make sure SAS token still valid/not expired
CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL [FlightsCred]
WITH IDENTITY='SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',  
SECRET = 'sv=2020-02-10&st=2023-11-08T23%3A48%3A54Z&se=2025-11-09T23%3A48%3A00Z&sr=d&sp=rl&sig=oeAvbsYaQg9zNxyXyPNN2yo%2Blx90Py4HgQn%2BCy4IQVw%3D&sdd=1'

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat]
WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET )

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [myGen2FS]
WITH (
	LOCATION   = 'abfss://bluebadgegen2fs@bluebadgegen22sa.dfs.core.windows.net/flightonefile' ,
	CREDENTIAL = FlightsCred
)

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE Flights
 ([Year] INT
,[Month] INT
,[DayofMonth] INT
,[DayOfWeek] INT
,[DepTime] VARCHAR(50)
,[CRSDepTime] VARCHAR(50)
,[ArrTime]  VARCHAR(50)
,[CRSArrTime]  VARCHAR(50)
,[UniqueCarrier] VARCHAR(50)
,[FlightNum] VARCHAR(50)
,[TailNum] VARCHAR(50)
,[ActualElapsedTime] INT
,[CRSElapsedTime] INT
,[AirTime] INT
,[ArrDelay] INT
,[DepDelay] INT
,[Origin] VARCHAR(50)
,[Destination] VARCHAR(50)
,[Distance] INT
,[TaxiIn] INT
,[TaxiOut] INT
,[Cancelled] BIT
,[CancelledCode] VARCHAR(50)
,[Diverted] BIT
,[CarrierDelay] VARCHAR(50)
,[WeatherDelay] VARCHAR(50)
,[NASDelay] VARCHAR(50)
,[SecurityDelay] VARCHAR(50)
,[LateAircraftDelay] VARCHAR(50)
,[IsArrDelayed] BIT
,[IsDepDelayed] BIT)
WITH
(
	LOCATION = '/',
	DATA_SOURCE = [myGen2FS],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
)

-- Test schema and non-empty table:
SELECT TOP (1) * FROM Flights

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS FlightsInternal
SELECT TOP(15000000) [Year],[Month],[DayofMonth],[DayOfWeek],[DepTime],[CRSDepTime],[ArrTime],[CRSArrTime],[UniqueCarrier],[FlightNum],[TailNum],[ActualElapsedTime],[CRSElapsedTime],[AirTime],[ArrDelay],[DepDelay],[Origin],[Destination],[Distance],[TaxiIn],[TaxiOut],[Cancelled],[CancelledCode],[Diverted],[CarrierDelay],[WeatherDelay],[NASDelay],[SecurityDelay],[LateAircraftDelay],[IsArrDelayed],[IsDepDelayed]
INTO FlightsInternal
FROM Flights

--Analytic query, batch mode off:
SELECT   Origin, Destination, UniqueCarrier, Diverted, Year, Month, DayOfMonth, SUM(ArrDelay), SUM(DepDelay)
FROM     FlightsInternal
GROUP BY Origin, Destination, UniqueCarrier, Diverted, Year, Month, DayOfMonth
ORDER BY Origin, Destination, UniqueCarrier, Diverted, Year, Month, DayOfMonth
OPTION(USE HINT('DISALLOW_BATCH_MODE'))

--Analytic query, batch mode on:
SELECT   Origin, Destination, UniqueCarrier, Diverted, Year, Month, DayOfMonth, SUM(ArrDelay), SUM(DepDelay)
FROM     FlightsInternal
GROUP BY Origin, Destination, UniqueCarrier, Diverted, Year, Month, DayOfMonth
ORDER BY Origin, Destination, UniqueCarrier, Diverted, Year, Month, DayOfMonth

DROP EXTERNAL TABLE Flights
DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [myGen2FS]
DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat]
DROP DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL [FlightsCred]
DROP MASTER KEY
